episodes.title: Hugh Hefner Cult: Kendra Wilkinson Tell All | The Girls Next Door
episodes.description:
Was the Playboy Mansion just a glamorous fantasy — or something far darker?
In this episode, we dive into the cult-like rules, 9PM curfews, bedroom surveillance, and psychological control Hugh Hefner allegedly imposed on the women of the Playboy Mansion.

From Kendra Wilkinson’s explosive new revelations to behind-the-scenes secrets from The Girls Next Door, we explore what really happened behind closed gates — and ask:
Was Hefner just a media mogul… or a manipulative cult leader in silk pajamas?

We break down:
 • Kendra Wilkinson’s teenage move-in story
 • Alleged bedroom cameras and “Girl Rankings”
 • The mind games behind the mansion
 • Celebrity access vs. controlled isolation
 • How the Playboy brand blurred glamour and control

Let’s talk about it.
Comment your thoughts — cult behavior or just extreme branding?

—

Subscribe for more deep dives into pop culture, power, and the dark side of fame.
